Plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.
Title: The Iron Giant
Writer: Tim McCanlies (screenplay), Brad Bird (screen story by), Ted Hughes (based on the book "The Iron Man" by)
Actors: Jennifer Aniston, Harry Connick Jr., Vin Diesel, James Gammon
tomatoConsensus: The endearing Iron Giant tackles ambitious topics and complex human relationships with a steady hand and beautifully animated direction from Brad Bird.
